name: Darksword: Battle Eternity
abstract: Darksword is an exciting, original non-stop VR action RPG.

detail.app_release_note:
New Content & Features
	New Co-Op Map: The Spider Queen's Lair
	New Feature: Co-Op Private Matching
		Users can create private servers
		Users can join a private server by entering its 5-digit code
		Users can be kicked/banned from a private server by its creator
		Users can share the 5-digit private server code to Discord
	New Add-on (paid content): Premium Avatar "CervusRox Avatar"
Balance Changes & Improvements
	Player max level increased from 50 to 60
	Added loot source info for crafting materials
	Co-Op mode changes:
		Capped monster max level
		Changed revival penalty duration: starting from 10 seconds up to 30 seconds, with 5 seconds increments per 	death
		Maximum damage to player capped at 30% of player's max HP
		Minimum damage to regular monsters fixed at 2% of max HP
	Increased story mode difficulty
	Decreased mini-map mode difficulty
Stability Improvements
	Low battery shutdown threshold increased from 1% to 2%
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO 4 Pro, PICO 4, PICO Neo3 Link
